item.title: quizApp
item.description: A quizapp is a CRUD quiz web-app that an user can Create / Read / Update / Delete quiz questions and following answers. The results are shown at the end of quiz with user's answer / correct answers / scores. People may take the quiz again with the same quesitons or modify questions and take them.
